content: Objective: - To approximately solve problems of algebra and calculus, using repetitive calculations, implemented in a computer Learning Outcome: At the end of the course the students should be able to - write the algorithms for numerical solution of basic problems of algebra and calculus, such as solution of algebraic and differential equations, optimization using gradient descent, prediction using regression, - implement the above algorithms in a computer writing their own programs from scratch, - write the limitations of the above algorithms, and - solve complex problems combining multiple algorithms.
